items.sentence: Why do things like this keep happening to me?
Why do things like this keep happening to us?
I\'ve always enjoyed playing tennis with Tom.
What\'ll happen to Tom if he\'s found guilty?
She\'d like him to come to her house at 2:30.
I still don\'t have enough money to buy that.
I still haven\'t forgiven Tom for doing that.
Tom pretended that he didn\'t recognize Mary.
Tom has trouble coping with people like Mary.
Tom hid the money he got from Mary in a book.
My father is busy getting ready for his trip.
There\'s an antique clock in the living room.
When was the last time you ate a pomegranate?
Where did you get that scratch on your cheek?
Why aren\'t you doing what I asked you to do?
You\'re a professional musician, aren\'t you?
Mary was the only girl Tom ever really loved.
Mary was the only girl Tom was interested in.
When was the last time you were really happy?
When was the last time your changed your oil?
